document.bingtitle: In the News: Fast Food Giant to Post Calorie Counts
document.webtitle: In the News: Fast Food Giant to Post Calorie Counts
document.description: I do eat fast food sometimes, but at least all the places I eat at have the nutrition ... out of Quiznos because they REMOVED their calorie information from their menu board...
document.body:
Psst, can you keep a secret? I have a confession !

In the News: Fast Food Giant to Post Calorie Counts Tweet Pin It Share on Tumblr By: Jen Mueller : 10/13/2008 7:29 AM 187 comments Would you think twice about your choice if fast food restaurants put calorie counts on their menus? The parent company of KFC, Taco Bell, Pizza Hut, Long John Silvers and A&W;All-American Food (Yum Brands, Inc.)
